amendment.description: Amendment ensures that no Federal tax dollars will be used by the Corps of Engineers to remove or mitigate the removal of the Condit Dam on the White Salmon River.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Corps of Engineers for the removal or associated mitigation of Federal Energy Regulatory Commission Project number 2342.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.
